quotes.text: Don't just pratice until you can do it right. Practice until you can't do it wrong

quotes.author: Söder, Markus
quotes.text: It's nice to be a preiss - but it's higher to be a bayer.

quotes.author: unknown
quotes.text: When you invest in your employees, you invest in your companys future

quotes.author: Millamn, Dan
quotes.text: 𝘋𝘢𝘴 𝘎𝘦𝘩𝘦𝘪𝘮𝘯𝘪𝘴 𝘥𝘦𝘳 𝘝𝘦𝘳𝘢̈𝘯𝘥𝘦𝘳𝘶𝘯𝘨 𝘪𝘴𝘵, 𝘥𝘢𝘴𝘴 𝘮𝘢𝘯 𝘴𝘪𝘤𝘩 𝘮𝘪𝘵 𝘢𝘭𝘭 𝘴𝘦𝘪𝘯𝘦 𝘌𝘯𝘦𝘳𝘨𝘪𝘦 𝘯𝘪𝘤𝘩𝘵 𝘥𝘢𝘳𝘢𝘶𝘧 𝘬𝘰𝘯𝘻𝘦𝘯𝘵𝘳𝘪𝘦𝘳𝘵, 𝘥𝘢𝘴 𝘈𝘭𝘵𝘦 𝘻𝘶 𝘣𝘦𝘬𝘢̈𝘮𝘱𝘧𝘦𝘯, 𝘴𝘰𝘯𝘥𝘦𝘳𝘯 𝘥𝘢𝘳𝘢𝘶𝘧, 𝘥𝘢𝘴 𝘕𝘦𝘶𝘦 𝘻𝘶 𝘦𝘳𝘣𝘢𝘶𝘦𝘯

quotes.text: Don't confuse a high salary with a great career.

quotes.text: Wer Bild-Zeitung liest um sich zu informieren, der trinkt auch Schnaps wenn er Durst hat.

quotes.text: Pessimists sound smart - optimists make money.

quotes.text: Truth is like poetry - and most people hate poetry.

quotes.text: Life isn't about waiting for the storm to pass; it's about learning to dance in the rain.

quotes.author: Steve Jobs
quotes.text: The ones who are crazy enough ti think they can change the world are the ones who do

quotes.author: Mark Twain
quotes.text: It ain't what you don't know what gets you into trouble - It's what you know for sure that just ain't so

quotes.author: Mark Twain
quotes.text: The two most important days in your life are the day when you where born and the day you find out why

quotes.author: Origin unknown
quotes.text: You can't write good tests for bad code

quotes.text: Godhart's law: When the focus is on the metric instead of the goal, it's a problem.

quotes.author: Michael Feathers

quotes.text: Legacy Code: Code that's too scary to update and too profitable to delete

quotes.author: Yoda
quotes.text: Fear is the path to the dark side:  Fear leads to anger Anger leads to hate Hate leads to suffering

quotes.author: Douglas Adams
quotes.text: Technology is stuff that doesn't work yet - when it works it's just stuff

quotes.author: Bruce Lee
quotes.text: A goal is not always meant to be reached - it often serves simply as something to aim at.
